info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:16PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Fairfield, central Westchester, east central Orange, western Putnam and Rockland Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 216 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Peekskill, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stamford, Norwalk, Port Chester, Ossining, Peekskill, New Canaan, Haverstraw, Mount Kisco, West Point, Greenwich, Harrison, Darien, Hawthorne, Harriman and Bedford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
